title: South Korea Mourns Loss of Young Victims, and Their Dreams, in Halloween Crowd Crush
description: More than 100 of those killed in the South Korean capital were in their 20s, planning for the next chapter of their lives.
dc:creator: Su-Hyun Lee, John Yoon, Luke Vander Ploeg and Victoria Kim
media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:description: A memorial in the Itaewon neighborhood of Seoul on Monday in honor of the victims of the Halloween disaster.
